title: I can't login to my client
body: So I can;t log in because apparently I'm being transferred and it says I should come back in a few minutes. However I have no desire to be transferred and I've waited 4 hours to log in again and it's still not working. I think something's wrong with my client but I dont know what it is. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
